title: What is difference between PROJECT skin orb and PROJECT skin shard ?
body: Which one to buy ? What is difference ?

replies.body: I assume a PROJECT Skin Shard will give you a random PROJECT skin shard, whereas the PROJECT Skin Orb will just give you a random skin shard. Generally, things with a more random variables tend to be cheaper than those with more focused variables. I personally went with the borders and icon, as those are limited event rewards. Skins and champions can always be obtained later. I personally will likely drop the extra tokens into BE (as I already own all the champions and skins available).

Heya, this info is on the [announcement page ](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-project-hunters-event)but there are a few things to keep in mind:

The PROJECT Skin Shard contains a skin shard for a random past PROJECT skin. It does not include shards for PROJECT: Vayne, PROJECT: Vi, or PROJECT: Jhin.  Orbs contain loot and range in size and cost.  Be sure to check the [learn more](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-project-hunters-event) page for more info!
